name: Proxmox Cluster Service
description: Checks Proxmox VE cluster quorum and restarts pve-cluster if quorum is lost.
check_cmd: if command -v pvecm >/dev/null 2>&1; then if pvecm status 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'Quorate'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart pve-cluster 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 3; if pvecm status 2>/dev/null | grep -q 'Quorate'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
